# quickcap


<!-- WARNING: THIS FILE WAS AUTOGENERATED! DO NOT EDIT! -->

## Installation

pip install quickcap

## Usage

### Login

``` python
import os

caprover_server = os.environ.get("CAPROVER_SERVER") 
caprover_password =os.environ.get("CAPROVER_PASSWORD") 

token = caplogin(caprover_server, caprover_password)
```

### Create a webapp

First, create your app in a Python file:

``` python
example_app = """from fasthtml.common import *

app = FastHTML()

@app.route("/")
def home(): return Div(H1("Hello World!"), P("Deployed with CapRover API"))

serve()
"""

from pathlib import Path 
Path("myapp.py").write_text(example_app)
```

    150

### Setup and deploy

Create the app on CapRover with SSL and optional configuration:

``` python
app_name = "myapp"

setup_app(caprover_server, token, app_name, env_vars={"MY_SECRET": "supersecret123"})
```

    {'status': 100, 'description': 'Updated App Definition Saved', 'data': {}}

Deploy your script:

``` python
# requirements: python package used by your app
requirements = ["python-fasthtml"]

deploy(caprover_server, token, app_name, "myapp.py", requirements)
```

    {'status': 100, 'description': 'Deploy is done', 'data': {}}

Your app is now live at `https://myapp.yourdomain.com`!

### Check logs

Runtime logs:

``` python
print(get_app_logs(caprover_server, token, app_name))
```

### Delete an app

``` python
delete_app(caprover_server, token, app_name)
```

    {'status': 100, 'description': 'App is deleted', 'data': {}}

# API Reference

| Function | Description |
|----|----|
| [`caplogin`](https://tchambon.github.io/quickcap/core.html#caplogin) | Login and get authentication token |
| [`setup_app`](https://tchambon.github.io/quickcap/core.html#setup_app) | Create app with SSL and configuration (recommended) |
| [`deploy`](https://tchambon.github.io/quickcap/core.html#deploy) | Build and deploy FastHTML app from script(s) |
| [`get_app_logs`](https://tchambon.github.io/quickcap/core.html#get_app_logs) | Get runtime logs |
| [`get_app_deployment_logs`](https://tchambon.github.io/quickcap/core.html#get_app_deployment_logs) | Get build logs |
| [`delete_app`](https://tchambon.github.io/quickcap/core.html#delete_app) | Remove an app |
| [`create_app`](https://tchambon.github.io/quickcap/core.html#create_app) | Register a new app (low-level) |
| [`update_app`](https://tchambon.github.io/quickcap/core.html#update_app) | Update app configuration (low-level) |
| [`enable_ssl`](https://tchambon.github.io/quickcap/core.html#enable_ssl) | Enable HTTPS for an app (low-level) |
| [`upload_app`](https://tchambon.github.io/quickcap/core.html#upload_app) | Upload tar.gz archive (low-level) |
